SEARCH
Module photos60
Package photos

Class Photo

java.lang.Object
photos.Photo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Photo extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a photo in the application. A photo has a file path, date taken, caption, and list of tags. The date is derived from the file's last modification time.
Author:
Group 60
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Photo

      public Photo(String filePath, LocalDateTime date)
      Constructs a Photo with the specified file path and date.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the absolute path to the photo file
      date - the date/time the photo was taken (from file modification time)

    • addTag

      public boolean addTag(Tag tag)
      Adds a tag to this photo. Duplicate tags (same type and value) are not added.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to add
      Returns:
      true if the tag was added, false if it was a duplicate

    • removeTag

      public boolean removeTag(Tag tag)
      Removes a tag from this photo.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to remove
      Returns:
      true if the tag was removed, false if it didn't exist

    • removeTagsByType

      public void removeTagsByType(String type)
      Removes all tags of a specific type.
      Parameters:
      type - the tag type to remove

    • getTagsByType

      public List<Tag> getTagsByType(String type)
      Finds all tags of a specific type.
      Parameters:
      type - the tag type to find
      Returns:
      a list of tags with the specified type

    • hasTag

      public boolean hasTag(Tag tag)
      Checks if this photo has a specific tag.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to check
      Returns:
      true if the tag exists, false otherwise

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this photo with another object. Two photos are equal if they have the same file path.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:

      Returns:
